metadata.job_to_be_done: Find recommendations for visiting South of France

extracted_sections.section_title: • Cook in the skillet until the tortilla is golden brown and crispy.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. • In another bowl, combine buttermilk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract. • Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.

• In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon. • Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides. • Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and melt the butter.
• 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon • In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cook them in a skillet over medium heat. • Add cheese, sausage or bacon, bell pepper, and onion to the eggs.
• 1 English muffin, split and toasted • Cook the egg in a skillet over medium heat, seasoning with salt and pepper. • Place the cheese on top of the egg to melt.
• Cook in the skillet until the tortilla is golden brown and crispy. • Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, mix mashed bananas and melted butter.
• Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, mix oats, honey or maple syrup, peanut butter, nuts, dried fruit, and vanilla • Press the mixture into a greased baking dish.
• Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). • Spread marinara sauce over the pizza crust. • Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.
• Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. • Stir in cheese, sausage or bacon, bell pepper, and onion.
• 1/4 cup black beans, rinsed and drained • 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1 large egg, poached or fried
• 1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced • Egg noodles or rice for serving • In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
